import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-services', templateUrl: './services.component.html', styleUrls: ['./services.component.css'] }) export class ServicesComponent { carIllustration = ` `; }

Car Insurance That Works For You

Smart technology, fair pricing, and instant claims.

Drive Green, Pay Less

Usage-based pricing

Pay based on how much and how safely you drive

Climate-conscious

Support sustainable transportation initiatives

Bundle savings

Save when you combine with home insurance

Comprehensive Coverage

Everything you need to drive with confidence.

Liability Coverage

Covers damage you may cause to other people or property.

Collision Coverage

Pays for damage to your car from crashes or rollovers.

Comprehensive Coverage

Protects against theft, vandalism, and weather damage.

Medical Payments

Covers medical expenses for you and your passengers.

Uninsured Motorist

Protection when the other driver doesn't have insurance.

Roadside Assistance

Help when you need towing, jump starts, or lockout service.
